title: Chrome adblocker like in Safari iOS
content:
Hi there,

I've moved from Apple after 13 years of using their products. The last Android system I've used it was Android 3 Honeycomb.

I LOVE Chrome on my laptop (desktop version) for ability use POWERFUL uBlock Origin adblocker (where on desktop Safari such a adblocker not exists)

I've found out on Android Chrome - there are no adblockers!!!!!! There are only separate browsers - but I need Chrome for all my MULTIPLATFORM passwords.

In iOS Safari I can install even few adblockers and "activate" them - on Android Chrome - there is only very simple build in Google adblocker which almost does not work.

There is one good adblocker on Android Chrome but requires Root - but I do not want to Root or mess around with my Pixel 4.

Are there any adblockers like I can do with iOS Safari?

Thank You
Bart
